attributes.action: detain the evil Vanessa George, Angela Allen and Colin Blanchard indefinately for public safety.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These three monsters are awaiting sentences after admitting a string of child sex offences. They are evil manipulative people and should be kept behind bars indefinitely for the protection of our children.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the courts.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
